overview:
Bob create LinkSV, www.linksv.com , an online data resouce, allowing members identify critically information on the people, capital and companies. The Advanced Search capability using our many filters makes it easy to find the background you are looking for. The same for Board members or investors. The LinkSV resources are very useful for service providers, startups, and tech companies looking for customers.

Bob is an active angel investor, an advisor to emerging Internet companies and is a co-founder of the Angels Breakfast Club. Bob retired from a 30-year career in the corporate liability insurance business where he spent 15 years as a Partner of Dinner Levison Company and another 15 years as SVP of the Sedgwick Group. A graduate of University of the Pacific, he and his wife, Jonlyn, reside in Saratoga, California. Their sons David and Steven are co-founders of Guayaki Sustainable Rainforest Products, a socially and environmentally conscious beverage company selling Guayaki Yerba Mate; a healthy and energizing drink. www.guayaki.com
